data.actual_result: The channel topic panel on the top right expands with nothing on it. A blank message which you can scroll up and down as well (depending upon how many new lines you've added, more new lines, more scrollable)
data.expected_result: The channel topic should be "No topic set." since new lines shouldn't be considered as characters.
data.short_description: Putting just new lines in channel topic and saving it afterwards makes the channel topic as a blank message. [A cross platform bug]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel settings. - Clear the channel topic of the text channel (if any) and keep adding new lines just by pressing enter. - Click on save and exit the channel settings menu, and notice the channel topic.
